    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String pDescription,
    java.lang.String pImageName,
    Item pItem)
        Create a room described "description" containing an Item. Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard".
        Parameters:
        pDescription - The room's description.
        pItem - The room's item
        pImageName - The room's image path

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String pDescription,
    java.lang.String pImageName)
        Create a room described "description". Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard".
        Parameters:
        pDescription - The room's description
